entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 04:33 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
